data.title: Utah Jazz at Atlanta Hawks: Opponent Game Thread Highlights
data.meta_description: Opponent Game Thread Host: Peachtree Hoops. BartowFalcon Welcome back JC BaldyTheImbecile Cheers to you John Collins. You're having a fine season for Utah, and you were a very good and valuable Atlanta Hawk. Never a problems off the court, always stand up on the court. True Atlanta Hawk fans appreciate all you did for the‚Ä¶

Cheers to you John Collins. You‚Äôre having a fine season for Utah, and you were a very good and valuable Atlanta Hawk. Never a problems off the court, always stand up on the court. True Atlanta Hawk fans appreciate all you did for the franchise. Thank you JC!
